snippet: Although he expressed patience with the Mets’ payroll, Wright, 31, has made the playoffs only once in 10 seasons with the team.
abstract: New York Mets third baseman David Wright has seven years left on contract extension he signed in 2012; having seen team make playoffs only once in his 10 seasons with Mets, he knows time is running out on hopes for team's payroll to increase enough to bring in top-end free agents and hopes of a championship.
lead_paragraph: Although he expressed patience with the Mets’ payroll, Wright, 31, has made the playoffs only once in 10 seasons with the team.

headline.main: With Urgency, David Wright Is Waiting to Win
headline.print_headline: With Urgency, Wright Is Waiting to Win
